progetto.model

Interface ObservableModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Model, ModelProxy

    public interface ObservableModel
extends IModel
    Contains all that is necessary to know the state of the game, the containers returned by this object must be permanent
    Author:
    Michele
